item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Bitwarden SDK relicensed from proprietary to GPLv3 (694 points | 251 comments)
2. Smarter Than 'Ctrl+F': Linking Directly to Web Page Content (98 points | 65 comments)
3. The mystifying, acrimonious battle between Arm and Qualcomm (11 points | 1 comment)
4. Notes on Anthropic's Computer Use Ability (8 points | 3 comments)
5. The “Godfather of AI” Predicted I Wouldn't Have a Job. He Was Wrong (25 points | 17 comments)
6. Quantized Llama models with increased speed and a reduced memory footprint (420 points | 100 comments)
7. Copilot vs. Cursor vs. Cody vs. Supermaven vs. Aider (5 points | discuss)
8. Yes, we did discover the Higgs (119 points | 50 comments)
9. Eartho: Open-Source, Privacy-Focused Alternative to Google Sign-In (16 points | 9 comments)
10. Launch HN: Skyvern (YC S23) – open-source AI agent for browser automations (293 points | 63 comments)
11. OpenFeature – a vendor-agnostic, community-driven API for feature flagging (132 points | 44 comments)
12. Why ghosts wear clothes or white sheets instead of appearing in the nude (4 points | 1 comment)
13. Why Safety Profiles Failed (193 points | 127 comments)
14. Never Missing the Train Again (300 points | 113 comments)
15. Security research on Private Cloud Compute (268 points | 91 comments)
16. Quit Social Media (2016) (137 points | 122 comments)
17. LibLISA – Instruction Discovery and Analysis on x86-64 (55 points | 8 comments)

19. Post World War II Food (228 points | 213 comments)
20. The Ballad of the Inquisition's Greatest Witch Trial (4 points | discuss)
21. Zigler: Zig NIFs in Elixir (204 points | 70 comments)
22. ST Book, the Notebook Atari ST (79 points | 43 comments)
23. Writer Underwriting Writer (24 points | 2 comments)
24. Vapi (YC W21) is hiring a founding infra engineer to handle scale ( | hide)
25. The Script Creator (28 points | 1 comment)
26. The Lion of St. Mark's Square in Venice Is Chinese (175 points | 63 comments)
27. Lingo: A Go micro language framework for building Domain Specific Languages (107 points | 36 comments)
28. The brain's waste clearing lymphatic system shown in people for first time (161 points | 52 comments)
29. Show HN: RF Hunter – Find hidden cameras and other devices (495 points | 153 comments)
30. Calculating the norm of a complex number (55 points | 32 comments)
